page.title: 15HOUSING-OUTSIDE A BUNGALOW
page.content: Most people live in detached bungalows .Many of the bungalows have chimneys on their sloping roofs.This suggests that coal fires are still important. Against one side wall there is normally an attached garage. A concrete or chipping drive leads to the garage. On the front wall there are 2 or 3 windows and a central door. Often there is a front porch. The backwall of the bungolow has a simiiar design to the front but the door is generally different.Back doors tend to be glass and front doors mostly wood. The garden surrounds the bungalows.The boundary is marked with a hedge or wall.Many have green houses and most gardens have trees and plants ,some gardens have ponds and garden gnomes.
